instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> headphone not detect
threads.message:
Hello 

Board was liquid damaged <CHIP>U6201</CHIP> area and can not boot.
Cleaned board and replaced <CHIP>U6201</CHIP> now boot and load OS. But now headphone only working when machine boot headphone connected. If you disconnect headphone jack  after boot headphone cant detect so only internal speaker works. 

Note: If you connect jack and close cover so sleep computer. Headphone detect after wakeup but when disconnect and jack not detect headphone only works internal speaker 

Replaced 3 time <CHIP>U6201</CHIP>, J6700,<CHIP>U6880</CHIP> and capacitors,resistors who looks bad but nothing change :( 

Any idea?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> headphone not detect
threads.message: Internal speakers work? Internal speakers turning off when HP plugged in?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> headphone not detect
threads.message: [USER="2"]dukefawks[/USER]  is not turning off when Headphone plugged but is you restart or sleep&wake up when connected hp ,internal speakers turn off and HP is working...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> headphone not detect
